com.gilran.chess

Class ShellClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gilran.chess.ShellClient

  • public class ShellClient
extends java.lang.Object
    A shell (command-line) Chess client.

    The shell client uses reflaction on itself in order to transform commands to methods. Due to this, all (non-static) public methods must fit the signature void(List).

    Author:
    Gil Ran
